abstract: An object that represents the current device.
overview:
## Return Value

A singleton object that represents the current device.

## Discussion

You access the properties of the returned [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice] instance to obtain information about the device. You must instantiate the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice] instance before registering to receive device notifications.

# current

**Type Property**

An object that represents the current device.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var current: UIDevice { get }
```

## Return Value

A singleton object that represents the current device.

## Discussion

You access the properties of the returned [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice] instance to obtain information about the device. You must instantiate the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice] instance before registering to receive device notifications.
